decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Approved plans
The amended development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the provisions and document schedules set out in Appendices 1-4 of the Planning Statement (Issue 3: October 2022) approved under planning permission P/2022/0111, in particular the items referred to in Appendix 4, unless otherwise superseded or updated by the following documents submitted as part of the subject application:
Drawing A-PL-001(Rev.A) and Unnumbered Location Plan, Cover Letter (14th June 2024) and Preliminary Ecological Appraisal (June 2024), received 17/06/2024. Amended Planning Statement (October 2024), received 05/11/2024.
Condition : 2 - Children's Play Structures
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 03/11/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(2  ) for the four play areas approved under that consent. Ahead of commencement of either of the two remaining play areas, detailed drawings shall have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to illustrate the play structures and boundary treatments and providing samples of the materials and finishes and surfacing materials and finishes to be used. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any such approval.
Condition : 3 - Animal enclosures
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the animal enclosure details contained within this consent.
Condition : 4 - High Ropes Course
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 27/08/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(4,9ii).
Condition : 5 - Adventure golf course
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 27/08/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(5).
Condition : 6 - Greenkeeper's facility
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 19/04/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(6,9i).
Condition : 7 - High ropes entrance
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details contained within this consent in relation to the Ticketing Kiosk (replacing H1 High Ropes Entrance in the original approval) and Briefing Areas A and B and the associated WC Block (replacing H2 High Ropes Hangout) which are hereby approved.
Condition : 8 - Viewing platform, caf�, WCs
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details contained within this consent in relation to the Kitchen and WC Block (replacing F1 'Viewing Platform, Caf� and Toilet' Block in the original approval) which are hereby approved.
Condition : 9 - Details of materials
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 27/08/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(4,9ii),  with the details approved on 19/04/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(6,9i) and with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(9,20,31) unless superseded by this application or otherwise.  
Condition : 10 - Hours of use
The use of the following elements of the development hereby permitted shall be limited to the following times:
The use of the following elements of the development hereby permitted shall be limited to the following times:
(a) The driving range and floodlighting shall not be open to customers or in use outside the hours of 07:00 hours to 22:30 hours Sunday-Thursday and 07:00 hours to 00:30 on Friday and Saturday.
(b) The golf clubhouse (including all facilities within) shall not be open to customers outside the hours of 07:00 to 22:30 hours Monday-Thursday and 07:00 hours to 00:30 on Friday and Saturday.
(c) The 9-hole golf course shall not be open to customers outside the hours of 07:00 hours to 22:30 hours Monday - Sunday.
(d) The adventure golf course shall not be open to customers outside the hours of 07:00 hours to 22:30 hours Monday - Sunday.
(e) The high ropes course shall not be open to customers outside the hours of 09:00 hours to 22:00 hours Monday - Sunday.
(f) The children's play barn, children's play areas and animal enclosures shall not be open to customers outside the hours of 09:00 hours to 20:00 hours Monday - Sunday.' 
Condition : 11 - Hours of construction
No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 08:00 to 18:00 on Mondays to Friday and 09:00 to 13:00 on Saturdays and no demolition or construction work shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior written agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 12 - Refuse storage and recycling
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 04/08/2022 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(12,26).
Condition : 13 - Floodlighting
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 28/04/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(13) unless superseded or updated by this application.
Condition : 14 - Landscape design
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 27/08/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(14-17i) unless superseded by this application or otherwise varied and approved in writing by the local planning authority. 
Condition : 15 - Boundary treatment
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 26/04/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(15i) and with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(15) unless superseded by this application or otherwise varied and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 16 - Landscape Management Plan
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 27/08/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(14-17i) unless superseded by this application or otherwise varied and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 17 - Tree planting
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 27/08/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(14-17i) unless superseded by this application or otherwise varied and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 18 - Trees to be retained
In this condition 'retained tree' means an existing tree which is to be retained in accordance with the approved plans and particulars, and paragraphs (a) and (b) below shall have effect until the expiration of five years from the date of the occupation of the Hobblers Heath building for its permitted use.
(a) No retained tree shall be cut down, uprooted or destroyed, nor shall any retained tree be topped or lopped other than in accordance with the approved plans and particulars, without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority. Any topping or lopping approved shall be carried out in accordance with British Standard 3998 (Tree Work) or any other BS replacing this.
(b) If any retained tree is removed, uprooted or destroyed or dies, another tree shall be planted at the same place and that tree shall be of such size and species, and shall be planted at such time, as may be specified in writing by the Local Planning Authority. 
(c) The erection of fencing for the protection of any retained tree shall be undertaken in accordance with the approved plans and particulars before any equipment, machinery or materials are brought onto the site for the purposes of the development, and shall be maintained until all equipment, machinery and surplus materials have been removed from the site. 
Nothing shall be stored or placed in any area fenced in accordance with this condition and the ground levels within those areas shall not be altered, nor shall any excavation be made, without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 19 - Parking
The parking, loading and turning spaces shown on drawing no. A-PL-005 Rev. B shall not be used for any other purposes than shown on the approved plans.
Condition : 20 - Contamination
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(9,20,31) in respect of parts (a) and (b) of the original consent.
The Local Planning Authority shall be notified immediately if additional contamination is discovered during the course of the development. A competent person shall assess the additional contamination, and shall submit appropriate amendments to the scheme for decontamination in writing to the Local Planning Authority for approval before any work on that aspect of development continues. The amended scheme shall be carried out as approved.
Condition : 21 - Construction Logistics Plan
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 24/04/2020 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(21) for any remaining construction works required.
Condition : 22 - Pedestrian underpass
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 15/10/2020 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(22,24), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority. 
Condition : 23 - Entry and exit signage
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 25/10/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(23-45), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 24 - Cycle storage
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 15/10/2020 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(22,24), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 25 - Car Park Management Plan
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 08/09/2022 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(25, 40), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 26 - Delivery and Servicing Plan
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 04/08/2022 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(12,26) unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 27 - Overflow parking
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 25/10/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(23-45), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority, with the overflow parking provision thereafter retained solely for its designated use.
Condition : 28 - Noise
The rating level of sound emitted from or associated with the development shall not exceed background sound levels by more than 5dB(A) between the hours of 07:00-23:00 (taken as LA90 in 15-minute periods at the nearest sound sensitive premises) and shall not exceed background sound levels between 23:00-07:00 (taken as LA90 in 15-minute periods at the nearest sound sensitive premises). All measurements and assessments shall be made in accordance with the methodology of BS 4142:2014 (Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound) and/or its subsequent amendments.
Condition : 29 - Energy Statement
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 19/06/2020 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(29), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Within three months of this decision, evidence (e.g. photographs, installation contracts and as-built certificates under the National Calculation Method) shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing to show that the development has been constructed in accordance with the approved Energy Statement, and any subsequent approved revisions.
Condition : 30 - BREEAM
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/01/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(30), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 31 - Sustainable drainage
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(9,20,31), unless superseded by this application or otherwise varied and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 32 - Ecological survey work
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(32-35), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 33 - Ecological Management Plan
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(32-35), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 34 - Invasive Species Management Plan
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(32-35), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 35 - Bird and bat boxes
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(32-35), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 36 - Archaeology
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 21/06/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(36), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 37 - Piling
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 28/01/2020 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(37) if remaining works are required, unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 38 - Bus stop relocation
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 25/10/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(23-45) unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 39 - Phasing of the development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved phasing plan, as updated through a non-material amendment approved 16/07/2018 under planning reference 01054/H/P38 (NMA) to facilitate an enabling works phase, unless an alternative phasing plan is first submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing which includes an assessment of any effects, including any different impacts on the environment.
Condition : 40 - Travel and Visitor Management Plan
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 08/09/2022 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(25, 40), unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 41 - Access road
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 25/10/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(23-45) unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 42 - Future footpath and cycle path improvements
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 03/05/2019 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(42) unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
Condition : 43 - Highway works
Development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the details approved on 25/10/2021 under planning reference 01054/H/P38(23-45) unless subsequently amended and approved in writing by the local planning authority.
description: Variation of condition 10 (opening hours) to allow extension of the opening hours for use for the golf club house, floodlighting and driving range from 22:00 up to 00:30 on Friday and Saturday and variation of condition 42 (safeguarded strip) to remove requirement for approval of details and implementation of footpath and cycleway of planning permission P/2022/0111 approved 31/01/2023 for the variation of condition 1 (approved plans) to allow for a reduced area of the 9 hole golf course and the formation of nature reserve on the remaining golf course area; installation of artificial grass surface for golf course tees, green and golf driving range; installation of lighting; animal enclosure details; updated siting and appearance of outbuildings; and landscaping details following planning application 01054/H/P38 approved under appeal APP/F5540/W/16/3160453 for development of children's zoo and adventure park, associated buildings and outdoor structures, childcare nursery, 9 hole golf course, floodlit golf driving range, surfing lake, high rope and zip line course and car parking alterations.
